name: GhostControl Inc. \u2013 A hilarious ghost-hunting simulation
blurb: Build your team of ghost hunters in a witty business simulation paired with strategic battles for PC, Mac and Linux.

rewards.reward: No Reward

The silly notebook: This reward is a great digital incentive. 1000 pages in a PDF file with empty lines for your own notes in a GhostControl Inc. like page design. Each page will be individually numbered! Also great as a present to someone you love. You missed the deadline to buy a present for mother's day? Next year you are covered!

The game for early birds! \u2022 Digital copy of the game \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual with valuable game tips \u2022 Backer forum \u2022 Backer Icon \u2022 Specterrific Hires Desktop background \u2022 Your name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.

Digital copy of the game \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual with valuable game tips \u2022 Backer forum \u2022 Backer Icon \u2022 Specterrific Hires Desktop background \u2022 Your name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.\u2028

THE AVATAR: Set of 10 ghostly Avatar Icons \u2022 Spooky Ringtone \u2022 Ghostipedia PDF \u2022 [PLUS the above]: \u2022 Digital game \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 PDF manual \u2022 Forum \u2022 Icon \u2022 Desktop background \u2022 Name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.\u2028

THE MUSICIAN: This \u00a312 tier will give you all the fine stuff from our \u00a310 tier PLUS a DRM-free MP3- and Ogg Vorbis-download of GhostControl Inc.'s great music, composed and recorded by Sound of Games, coming in both looping and non-looping versions. The game's soundtrack will contain:\u00a0Main Theme \u2022 Driving music \u2022 Ghosthunting music and Headquarter-music. NOTE: ALL PLEDGES ABOVE OF \u00a312 WILL NOW ALSO CONTAIN THE MUSIC.

THE TESTER: Beta Access \u2022 [PLUS the above]: \u2022 Digital game \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual \u2022 Forum \u2022 Icon \u2022 Desktop background \u2022 Name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 Avatar Icons \u2022 Ringtone \u2022 Ghostipedia PDF \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.\u2028\u2028

THE TALKER: Create three phrases for ghost hunters to shout out while hunting (now included in all rewards \u00a330+) \u2022 [PLUS the above]: \u2022 Beta Access \u2022 Digital game \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual \u2022 Forum \u2022 Icon \u2022 Desktop background \u2022 Name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 Avatar Icons \u2022 Ringtone \u2022 Ghostipedia PDF \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.

THE TEE: One T-shirt of your choice (see choices in the AddOn section) optionally signed by the artist. Beautiful GOTS-certified organic-cotton fair-trade T-Shirts (size S-XXL) \u2022 Beta Access \u2022 Digital game \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual \u2022 Forum \u2022 Icon \u2022 Desktop background \u2022 Name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 Avatar Icons \u2022 Ringtone \u2022 Ghostipedia PDF \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description. Please note that the T-shirt is not automatically part of other reward tiers. If you select another reward and want the T-shirt anyway please add the T-shirt AddOn.

WE'RE FUNDED!: Choose a name for a team appearing in the game \u2022 One more digital game license \u2022 [PLUS the above]: \u2022 Total of two digital game licenses \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual \u2022 Forum \u2022 Icon \u2022 Desktop background \u2022 Name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 Avatar Icons \u2022 Ringtone \u2022 Ghostipedia PDF \u2022 Beta Access \u2022 Name a Ghost Hunter \u2022 Face in the game \u2022 Alpha build \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.

THE REAL GHOSTHUNTER: A very special T-shirt with your Ghost Hunter portrait on the front. This will be one of a kind. See sample in the AddOns section. Beautiful GOTS-certified organic-cotton fair-trade T-Shirts (size S-XXL). Send us a photo and we\u2018ll create a Ghost Hunter image from it for the game AND for a T-shirt \u2022 Access to Alpha build \u2022 A second digital license for the game to give to a friend \u2022 [PLUS the above]: \u2022 Digital game \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual \u2022 Forum \u2022 Icon \u2022 Desktop background \u2022 Name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 Avatar Icons \u2022 Ringtone \u2022 Ghostipedia PDF \u2022 Beta Access \u2022 Name a Ghost Hunter \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.\u2028Please note that the T-shirt is not automatically part of other reward tiers. If you select another reward and want a T-shirt anyway please add on of the standard T-shirts as an AddOn.

GHOST CREATOR: Create a ghost/phenomena \u2022 Your name in the game startup credits \u2022 [PLUS the above]: \u2022 Total of 4 digital game licenses \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual \u2022 Forum \u2022 Icon \u2022 Desktop background \u2022 Name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 Avatar Icons \u2022 Ringtone \u2022 Ghostipedia PDF \u2022 Beta Access \u2022 Name a Ghost Hunter \u2022 Face in the game \u2022 Alpha build \u2022 Teamname \u2022 News story \u2022 Name in ingame Credits \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.

INGAME GRAPHICS: Place your own graphics in the game. You can give us graphics meeting our specifications that we can then place on a Zeppelin that is flying over the city. This is chosen randomly so it may or may not appear during a given game.\r\nNOTE: We reserve the right to accept only content that appears to be appropriate for the game. \u2022 Six more digital game licenses \u2022 Eternal Gratitude from all of us \u2022 [PLUS the above]: \u2022 Total of 10 digital game licenses \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual \u2022 Forum \u2022 Icon \u2022 Desktop background \u2022 Name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 Avatar Icons \u2022 Ringtone \u2022 Ghostipedia PDF \u2022 Beta Access \u2022 Name a Ghost Hunter \u2022 Face in the game \u2022 Alpha build \u2022 Teamname \u2022 News story \u2022 Name in ingame Credits \u2022 Create a ghost \u2022 Name in startup credits \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.\u2028\u2028

THE VISITOR: Invitation to Heidelberg or London - your choice. Meet members of the team! We will meet you in either London or Heidelberg take you around for a day and have dinner with you. Accomodation and travel at your own expense.\u2022 [PLUS the above]: \u2022 Total of 10 digital game licenses \u2022 Silly notebook \u2022 Digital manual \u2022 Forum \u2022 Icon \u2022 Desktop background \u2022 Name in the backed by section of the game and on our web site \u2022 Avatar Icons \u2022 Ringtone \u2022 Ghostipedia PDF \u2022 Beta Access \u2022 Name a Ghost Hunter \u2022 Face in the game \u2022 Alpha build \u2022 Teamname \u2022 News story \u2022 Name in ingame Credits \u2022 Create a ghost \u2022 Name in startup credits \u2022 Place your graphics \u2022 Eternal Gratitude \u2022 NOTE: Details on the rewards in the FAQ section at the end of the project description.\u2028\u2028
